update vehicle
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vin = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
license = #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_num = #{companyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update vehicle set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vin = #{vin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, license = #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_num = #{companyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chassis = #{chassis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, configure = #{configure,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_way = #{purchaseWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_company_id = #{userCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, owner_company_id = #{ownerCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from vehicle v
v.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%')
and v.type LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{type}),'%')
and v.vin LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{vin}),'%')
and v.license LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{license}),'%')
and v.chassis LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{chassis}),'%')
and v.brand LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{brand}),'%')
and v.status LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{status}),'%')
and v.purchase_way LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{purchaseWay}),'%')
and v.user_company_id = #{userCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and v.owner_company_id = #{ownerCompanyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and v.create_by LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{createBy}),'%')
and v.create_time <= #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and v.create_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
and v.last_update_by LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{lastUpdateBy}),'%')
